Package Alertas

Class AvaliaAlertaAssalto

  • java.lang.Object
    • Alertas.AvaliaAlertaAssalto
  • public class AvaliaAlertaAssalto
extends java.lang.Object
    Checks weather a Movimento or Luminosidade Medicao is an alert or not. This Medicoes have been checked before to see if they are valid or not. It this verification, it the value is an alert, it checks if there is a Ronda happening and if their is, it doesn't send an alert.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AvaliaAlertaAssalto​(Anomalias.Medicao movimento, Anomalias.Medicao luminosidade, java.lang.Double luminosidadeLuzEscuro)
      Calls the method to checks weather there is an alert or not.

    • Method Detail

      • connectMysqlAssalto

        public void connectMysqlAssalto()

      • existeAlerta

        public boolean existeAlerta()

      • valorEAlerta

        public boolean valorEAlerta()
        Checks weather a Medicao value surpasses the limits(in the luminosidade case) or it's an 1 (there is moviment)
        Returns:
        A boolean saying wether it should be an alert or not according to its value

      • insereTabelaAlerta

        public void insereTabelaAlerta()
        Inserts into the tabela Alerta - according to the type of alert, it checks wether the last alert of that type was send was in an interval superior to what the user wanted. If it is not, it will not send an Alerta - it will not insert into the table and the Android application won't catch it. If it sends an alert, the variable responsible for keeping track of the last time an alert of type x was send gets reseted.

      • existeRonda

        public boolean existeRonda()
        Checks wether there is a Ronda happening or not. If a ronda happens for more than 48h it will not work. It will call a Stored Procedure to check in the medicao_sensores and medicao_sensores_anomalos if there is a ronda. If there is a ronda happening a variable gets updated and it will not be check again until the current one finishes.
        Returns:
        wether a Ronda exists or not.
